## Summary

What does this PR change and why?

## Type

- [ ] feat
- [ ] fix
- [ ] docs
- [ ] quality (ranking/dedup/source tuning)

## Checklist

- [ ] `npm test` passes locally
- [ ] Added/updated unit tests (when behavior changes)
- [ ] Updated docs/schema (when config keys or sources schema changes)
- [ ] No secrets committed (cookies, tokens, credentials)
- [ ] Source changes include `weight`/`reliability` rationale (if applicable)
